data.title: Netview Consulting Inc.
data.meta_description:
Netview Consulting is working as a trusted technology advisor that assists companies to save costs on technology.
Our technology focus will assist in: 
SD-WAN
Hosted PBX
Managed Network & Firewall
Security & PenTests
Staff Augmentation & DC Support
Voice Services & SIP, Broadband Internet, MPLS & Fiber
data.text:
Managed Network Security Services

NVCI provides a comprehensive suite of IT managed services and network security.

Microsoft Office 365 support

Application and storage support including DR planning

Cloud-based backup management and remote access

Process automation and virtua lization

24/7/365 network monitoring

Identity and access management

Standard and extended service desks

Virtual desktop infrastructure,

Standard operations and server OS support

Our managed security practice is available for expert security monitoring. We offer both on-site and hosted firewall management that includes the following services.

Maximize derived value from technology

Managed firewall plans ensure you get the greatest value from your next generation firewall. Our highly trained team will configure and maintain your equipment to meet your specific needs.
